name: Reroll Your Fate
description:
It's always there, that omniscient being, shaping your life on the whims of its dice. Your own path can only be carved through force; by battling it and its accursed "adventurers".

A project destined for grittiness and edge, brought back into silliness and wonderful jank by the joy of time constraints. Done for the 48-hour GMTK Game Jam 2022, featuring programming by Isaac Bowes and art by Dahlia Tarrow!

We hope you enjoy!

If you like this, be sure to check out:

HTD by Dahlia Tarrow (also available on Steam)

Isaac Bowes'  portfolio
